spell.name: Ophiuchus
spell.combatDescription: * Only players with Lucky may use or learn Ophiuchus. * Place The Magician on Ophiuchus. * Something magical happens. * What is it? * You tell me. * Propose a small, useful magical effect to the GM. * (As a guideline, it should about half as powerful as the other spells.) * The GM will decide if it is reasonable. * If it is, it happens. * Discard the card played on Ophiuchus at the end of the turn.
spell.skillDescription: * Once per Day, something magical happens. * What is it? * You tell me. * Propose a small, useful magical effect to the GM. * The GM will decide if it is reasonable. * (As a guideline, it should about half as powerful as the other spells.) * If it is, it happens.
spell.flavor: The serpent-bearer is mysterious and unpredictable.
